promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic strong gorilla dark-type pokemon holding a amethyst glaive. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or gorilla. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Obsidiathan, a a gigantic strong gorilla dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Obstruct, Junk Hunt. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gorilla", "dark" or "Obsidiathan". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, gorilla-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Dwelling in shadowy crypts, Obsidiathan, a hulking, ebony primate, employs Obstruct to block foes and uses Junk Hunt to gather supplies.
